alert.note: Alert for Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 22 at 7:23PM PST until January 23 at 10:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST TUESDAY ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 7000 feet. New snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches will be possible for elevations above 7,000 feet through tomorrow morning. * WHERE...Elevations above 7,000 feet in the Sheep Range and Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon. * WHEN...Through 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Heavy wet snow will add weight to sensitive structures and rooftops. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dense fog through the overnight period will result in limited visibility and dangerous driving conditions. Utilize extra caution when driving.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon
